ivardefs.name: doseQuantity
ivardefs.desc: The quantity of vaccine product that was administered.

ivardefs.name: education_
ivardefs.desc: Educational material presented to the patient (or guardian) at the time of vaccine administration.

ivardefs.name: encounter
ivardefs.desc: The visit or admission or other contact between patient and health care provider the immunization was performed as part of.

ivardefs.name: expirationDate
ivardefs.desc: Date vaccine batch expires.

ivardefs.name: fundingSource
ivardefs.desc: Indicates the source of the vaccine actually administered. This may be different than the patient eligibility (e.g. the patient may be eligible for a publically purchased vaccine but due to inventory issues, vaccine purchased with private funds was actual

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: A unique identifier assigned to this immunization record.

ivardefs.name: isSubpotent
ivardefs.desc: Indication if a dose is considered to be subpotent. By default, a dose should be considered to be potent.

ivardefs.name: location
ivardefs.desc: The service delivery location where the vaccine administration occurred.

ivardefs.name: lotNumber
ivardefs.desc: Lot number of the  vaccine product.

ivardefs.name: manufacturer
ivardefs.desc: Name of vaccine manufacturer.

ivardefs.name: note_
ivardefs.desc: Extra information about the immunization that is not conveyed by the other attributes.

ivardefs.name: patient
ivardefs.desc: The patient who either received or did not receive the immunization.

ivardefs.name: performer_
ivardefs.desc: Indicates who performed the immunization event.

ivardefs.name: primarySource
ivardefs.desc: An indication that the content of the record is based on information from the person who administered the vaccine. This reflects the context under which the data was originally recorded.

ivardefs.name: programEligibility_
ivardefs.desc: Indicates a patient's eligibility for a funding program.

ivardefs.name: protocolApplied_
ivardefs.desc: The protocol (set of recommendations) being followed by the provider who administered the dose.

ivardefs.name: reaction_
ivardefs.desc: Categorical data indicating that an adverse event is associated in time to an immunization.

ivardefs.name: reasonCode_
ivardefs.desc: Reasons why the vaccine was administered.

ivardefs.name: reasonReference_
ivardefs.desc: Condition, Observation or DiagnosticReport that supports why the immunization was administered.

ivardefs.name: recorded
ivardefs.desc: The date the occurrence of the immunization was first captured in the record - potentially significantly after the occurrence of the event.

ivardefs.name: reportOrigin
ivardefs.desc: The source of the data when the report of the immunization event is not based on information from the person who administered the vaccine.

ivardefs.name: route
ivardefs.desc: The path by which the vaccine product is taken into the body.

ivardefs.name: site
ivardefs.desc: Body site where vaccine was administered.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: Indicates the current status of the immunization event.

ivardefs.name: statusReason
ivardefs.desc: Indicates the reason the immunization event was not performed.

ivardefs.name: subpotentReason_
ivardefs.desc: Reason why a dose is considered to be subpotent.

ivardefs.name: vaccineCode
ivardefs.desc: Vaccine that was administered or was to be administered.

properties.desc: Describes the event of a patient being administered a vaccine or a record of an immunization as reported by a patient, a clinician or another party.
